comment: This is my last course at KSU, and this is also the most impressive class I took in the program. Dr. Han provided us the flexible but still very challenging opportunity to work on a real-life project with the company to learn first-hand experiences. Our project sponsor is also an awesome guy with rich experiences.
I really cannot forget how much he did for my career with recommendations and a big amount of support. He is a great guy!
He really brings great opportunities from real-life projects for us. The course is purely project-based, and he provides awesome guidance for our team.
He provided very comprehensive information in this class and the content is great to a freshman in business intelligence like me. Awesome experience!

Even this is a summer online course, Dr. Han always have the fastest response and provide the guidance immediately to help. He is also very kind to offer some flexible schedule to allow me complete most of the module in advance.
It was frustrated during the COVID-19, while he made a lot of effort, and finally, it was not bad. The additional effort on grading and the project he made is quite useful.
He did a good job! The outside resources he provided are very interesting!
He provided the innovative project option, and provided the bonus for my research effort on cybersecurity.
I just got the grade! He is very considerate of students who have difficulties. And he really saves my life in this tough semester.
The project is very intensive, while if you follow the instruction, you will gain a lot!
He is so impressive particularly in the first several lectures with his super solid background in FinTech, although the following course moved to online due to COVID-19.

The audio in the recorded lectures were inaudible, as well as the ppt slides occasionally not even being related to the content listed in the syllabus. The professor also waited until April to assign a project building a blockchain app to have it due in three weeks. He also ignored 80% of assignments, leaving us with this project and a quiz.

This professor showed he genuinely is not concerned with the class. Our Wireless Security group project was done by 2 of us out of 4. We did not choose our group, the groups were not locked down. We got 2 randos who joined and worked on the day it was due ONLY. When proven to the professor his response was that this isn't his problem. Hedoesminimal
He is great!
He did a great job of managing the class. The innovative project is quite interesting.
The instructor was good about keeping deadlines clear. The instructor also provided good background materials for the course.
The instructor was responsive to questions and graded assignments promptly.
Great professor. It is very obvious that he is passionate about the subject and truly cared about his students. Interesting material and effective teaching skills. Very easy to talk to and relate to.
Great teacher! Care the students.

Instructor was fantastic, very enthusiastic about programming. So much so that it becomes infectious. He was also very understanding of the plight of students and the problems they have to deal with. Great instructor, glad I took this class I learned a lot.
Great Teacher!
